message: Hi Bob, I'm offering my product to you for $90. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very useful.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. I'm willing to pay that price, but I'm not sure if I can go any lower.
Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $70 is just too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $85?  It's still a good deal for you, and it allows me to make a fair profit.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. I'm willing to pay that price, but I'm not sure if I can go any lower.
